item.title: Curriculum Vitae - Dr. Georgi L. Kapchits
item.description:
Personal Information

Full Name: Georgi Leonidovich Kapchits
Born: October 2, 1939
Nationality: Russian Federation
Languages: Russian (native), Somali (fluent), English (fluent), German (proficient), Amharic (proficient)

Education

1967 - Institute of Oriental Languages, Moscow State University
Specialization: Amharic and Somali Languages and Literature of Africa
Degree: Specialist Diploma with Distinction

2000 - Moscow State University
Degree: Candidate of Philological Sciences (PhD equivalent)
Dissertation: “Syntax of Somali Language”
Defense Date: [Specific date to be added]
